title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 996/88 of 15 April 1988 on the supply of refined sunflower oil to the Arab Republic of Egypt as food aid

COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 996/88  of 15 April 1988  on the supply of refined sunflower oil to the Arab Republic of Egypt as food aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A tendering procedure is hereby initiated for the award of a contract for the supply of refined sunflower oil to Egypt in accordance with the provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 2200/87 and with the conditions laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
